statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id < 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_admins FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id, MIN(user_id) AS min_user_id FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT MAX(user_id), MIN(role_id) FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, password_hash FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.user_id, username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE user_id < 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC, role_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(user_roles.user_id) AS 'role_count' FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = (SELECT role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 'c5530f92-2194-4ec6-933e-207d8c433607');
SELECT user_id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON user_roles.user_id = users.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT permissions.permission_name, roles.role_name FROM permissions JOIN role_permissions ON permissions.permission_id = role_permissions.permission_id JOIN roles ON role_permissions.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, created_at, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
